title: OpenAI releases GPT-4o
summary: OpenAI announces GPT-4o, a new flagship model that can reason across audio, vision, and text in real time.

title: Google introduces Gemini 1.5
summary: The next-generation model delivering breakthrough performance with a 1 million token context window.

title: Meta Llama 3 Available
summary: Meta releases Llama 3, the most capable openly available LLM to date, featuring improved reasoning.
